name: Microforwarder-multicast
body:
### Idea

NDN micro-forward is a in-browser forwarder implemented in Javascript. The idea is to use one of the forwarder as a relay to outside world while other devices on the same network use multicast to retrieve content from the relay. This is useful where Internet connectivity is not very good.


### Tasks
* Protocol to select a gateway
* Stand up a NDNFS server for serving test content
* Implement a in-browser content store 
* Implement pipeline for retrieving content
* Multicast configuration scripts for local network
* Test for Firefox and Chrome
* Test for Linux and Mac
* Stream video through a set of micro-forwarders
* Easy installation script

### Authors and Contributors
Jeff Thompson, Wentao Shang, Susmit Shannigrahi, Zhehao Wang
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
